# Dataset parameter
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Reads a meta data parameter from a dataset in Corporate Memory. If authentication is enabled, workbench.superuser must be configured.


## Parameter

### Project

The project of the dataset.

- ID: `project`
- Datatype: `project`
- Default Value: `cmem`



### Dataset

The dataset the meta data parameter is read from.

- ID: `dataset`
- Datatype: `task`
- Default Value: `None`



### Key

No description

- ID: `key`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `None`



### Lang

No description

- ID: `lang`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `None`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
